entry.title: OpenCV + dlibå®ç°äººè„¸è¯†åˆ«ä¸åŒ¹é…
entry.content:
demo_1: äººè„¸å®šä½ï¼ˆä»…opencvï¼‰

å®‰è£…opencv

pip install opencv-python

â—ï¸éœ€è¦åŒ…Pythonè·¯å¾„ä¸‹/Lib/site-packages/cv2/data/haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml

ä»£ç å®ç°

demo1_1.py

import cv2

def detect(filename):
    face_cascade = cv2.CascadeClassifier('/Users/keyi/PycharmProjects/face1/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/cv2/data/haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml')

    img = cv2.imread(filename)
    gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)

    faces = face_cascade.detectMultiScale(gray, 1.3, 5)

    for (x, y, w, h) in faces:
        img = cv2.rectangle(img, (x, y), (x + w, y + h), (255, 0, 0), 2)


    cv2.imshow('Person Detected!', img)
    cv2.waitKey(0)
    cv2.destroyAllWindows()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    detect('/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG')

å‡†ç¡®æ€§æ›´å¥½çš„demo1_2.py

import face_recognition
import cv2

image = face_recognition.load_image_file("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG")
face_locations_noCNN=face_recognition.face_locations(image)
# A list of tuples of found face locations in css (top, right, bottom, left) order
# å› ä¸ºè¿”å›å€¼çš„é¡ºåºæ˜¯è¿™æ ·å­çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨åé¢çš„forå¾ªç¯é‡Œé¢èµ‹å€¼è¦æ³¨æ„æŒ‰è¿™ä¸ªé¡ºåºæ¥



print("face_location_noCNN:")
print(face_locations_noCNN)
face_num2=len(face_locations_noCNN)
print(face_num2)       # The number of faces
# åˆ°è¿™é‡Œä¸ºæ­¢ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è§‚å¯Ÿä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µçš„åæ ‡å’Œäººè„¸æ•°ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ¥è¯´ï¼Œåæ ‡ä¼šä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ£€æµ‹å‡ºæ¥çš„äººè„¸æ•°åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„
# ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´face_num1ã€€ï¼ã€€face_numï¼’ï¼›ã€€face_locations_useCNNã€€å’Œã€€face_locations_noCNNã€€ä¸ä¸€æ ·


org = cv2.imread("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG")
img = cv2.imread("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG")
cv2.imshow("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG",img)  # åŸå§‹å›¾ç‰‡




for i in range(0,face_num2):
    top = face_locations_noCNN[i][0]
    right = face_locations_noCNN[i][1]
    bottom = face_locations_noCNN[i][2]
    left = face_locations_noCNN[i][3]

    start = (left, top)
    end = (right, bottom)

    color = (0,255,255)
    thickness = 2
    cv2.rectangle(org, start, end, color, thickness)

cv2.imshow("no cnn ",org)

cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

å¯å¾—åˆ°äººè„¸è¯†åˆ«åå›¾åƒğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

demo_2: äººè„¸å®šä½ï¼ˆdlib + face_recognitionï¼‰

å®‰è£…dlib / face_recognition

pip install dlib
pip install face_recognition

â—ï¸éœ€è¦åŒ…shape_predictor_68_face_landmarks.dat

ä»£ç å®ç°

demo2.py

#coding=utf-8

import cv2
import dlib

path = "/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1971.JPG"
img = cv2.imread(path)
gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)

#äººè„¸åˆ†ç±»å™¨
detector = dlib.get_frontal_face_detector()
# è·å–äººè„¸æ£€æµ‹å™¨
predictor = dlib.shape_predictor(r"/Users/keyi/PycharmProjects/face1/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_recognition_models/models/shape_predictor_68_face_landmarks.dat")
dets = detector(gray, 1)
for face in dets:
    shape = predictor(img, face)  # å¯»æ‰¾äººè„¸çš„68ä¸ªæ ‡å®šç‚¹
    # éå†æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹ï¼Œæ‰“å°å‡ºå…¶åæ ‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœˆå‡ºæ¥
    for pt in shape.parts():
        pt_pos = (pt.x, pt.y)
        cv2.circle(img, pt_pos, 2, (0, 255, 0), 1)
    cv2.imshow("image", img)

cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

å¯å¾—åˆ°äººè„¸å®šä½ç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

demo_3: äººè„¸åŒ¹é…

åŸç†

æ¯ä¸ªäººè„¸è¯†åˆ«ç³»ç»Ÿéƒ½æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„äººè„¸æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œè¯¥æ•°æ®åº“åŒ…å«äººè„¸ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

  • äººè„¸ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡æå–ï¼š
  • ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡PCAé™ç»´ï¼š

ä»£ç å®ç°

demo3.py

import cv2
import face_recognition
#æ˜¾ç¤ºå·²çŸ¥å›¾ç‰‡
known_image=cv2.imread("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1892.JPG")
cv2.imshow("image", known_image)
# cv2.waitKey(0)
# cv2.destroyAllWindows()
known_image = face_recognition.load_image_file("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1892.JPG")
# æ˜¾ç¤ºå¾…åŒ¹é…å›¾ç‰‡
unknown_image=cv2.imread("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1747.JPG")
cv2.imshow("unknown_image", unknown_image)
# cv2.waitKey(0)
# cv2.destroyAllWindows()
unknown_image = face_recognition.load_image_file("/Users/keyi/Downloads/IMG_1747.JPG")

known_encoding = face_recognition.face_encodings(known_image)[0]
unknown_encoding = face_recognition.face_encodings(unknown_image)[0]

results = face_recognition.compare_faces([known_encoding],
                                         unknown_encoding,
                                         tolerance=0.6)
if results[0] == True:
    print("åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¯¥æœªçŸ¥å›¾ç‰‡ä¸å·²æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡äººè„¸å¯åŒ¹é…ï¼")
else:
    print("åŒ¹é…å¤±è´¥ï¼")

ç»“æœè¾“å‡º

å½“known_imageå’Œunknown_imageä¸ºåŒä¸€å¼ äººè„¸æ—¶ï¼ŒåŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

å½“known_imageå’Œunknown_imageä¸ºä¸åŒäººè„¸æ—¶ï¼ŒåŒ¹é…å¤±è´¥ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

entry.title: Node.JS+Vue+Vite+D3
entry.content:
é‡è¦æ¦‚å¿µğŸ“•

  • Node.jsï¼šæœ¬æ•™ç¨‹å¼€å‘çš„å‰ç½®åŸºç¡€ç¯å¢ƒ
  • npm / yarnï¼šåŒ…ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼Œnpm å·²éš Node.js é»˜è®¤å®‰è£…ï¼Œyarnå¯é€‰ï¼ˆä½†å»ºè®®å°è¯•ï¼‰
  • D3ï¼šæŒ‡Data-Driven Documentsï¼Œæ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–æœ€ä¸ºæµè¡Œçš„åŸºç¡€åº“
  • Vueï¼šThe Progressive JavaScript Frameworkï¼Œç›®å‰æœ€ä¸ºæµè¡Œçš„å‰ç«¯æ¡†æ¶ä¹‹ä¸€ï¼Œç›¸æ¯”Reactå­¦ä¹ æ›²çº¿è¦æ›´ä¸ºå¹³ç¼“
  • Viteï¼šNative-ESM powered web dev build toolï¼Œé¢å‘æœªæ¥çš„å‰ç«¯æ„å»ºå·¥å…·

å°è¯•å®‰è£…Node.js

Node.jsä¸‹è½½åœ°å€ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»Node.jsä¸‹è½½ç‚¹è¿™é‡Œ

éªŒè¯æ˜¯å¦å®‰è£…æˆåŠŸï¼šTerminalè¾“å…¥node --versionï¼ˆå¦‚æœ‰å¯¹åº”ç‰ˆæœ¬è¾“å‡ºï¼Œå³ä¸ºå®‰è£…æˆåŠŸï¼‰

å°è¯•å®‰è£…Vue / Vite

å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å®‰è£…yarnï¼Œéœ€è¦å…ˆä½¿ç”¨å‘½ä»¤npm install yarnè¿›è¡Œå®‰è£…

  • å®‰è£…Vue
npm install vue
yarn add vue

(å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æŒ‡å®šç‰ˆæœ¬çš„vueå¯ä»¥æŠŠvueæ¢æˆvue@ç‰ˆæœ¬)

  • å®‰è£…Vite
npm install vite
  • åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªvueçš„ç©ºå·¥ç¨‹ï¼ˆæ­¤å¤„å‘½åä¸ºhellovueï¼‰
npm init vite-app hellovue
  • ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨ç°æœ‰æ¨¡ç‰ˆæ¥åˆ›å»ºå·¥ç¨‹
#npm 6.x
npm init @vitejs/app my-vue-app --template vue

#npm 7+, extra double-dash is needed:
npm init @vitejs/app my-vue-app â€“ --template vue

#yarn
yarn create @vitejs/app my-vue-app --template vue
  • è¿è¡Œåˆ›å»ºçš„webå·¥ç¨‹
npm run dev

ç½‘é¡µè¾“å…¥http://localhost:8080,å³å¯å‡ºç°å¦‚ä¸‹ç•Œé¢

  • macç”¨æˆ·å®‰è£…VScode

    VScodeä¸‹è½½ç‚¹è¿™é‡ŒğŸ‘‰ğŸ»VScodeä¸‹è½½

D3ç›´æ–¹å›¾ğŸ“Š

  • å®‰è£…D3 / axios
yarn add d3
yarn add axios
  • å…³é”®ä»£ç 

Barchart.vue

<template>
 <h2>ç½—å¯æ„201811153028 å’±æ˜¯ç›´æ–¹å›¾</h2>
 <div id="bar-chart-container"></div>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import axios from "axios";
import * as d3 from "d3";

export default defineComponent({
 data() {
   return {
     color: "steelblue",
     margin: { top: 30, right: 0, bottom: 30, left: 40 },
   };
 },
 /**
  * åœ¨æŒ‚è½½åå³å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œ
  */
 mounted() {
   axios.get("./alphabet.json").then((res) => {
     const barChartData = Object.assign(this.formatData(res.data), {
       format: "%",
       y: "â†‘ Frequency",
     });
     this.drawBarChart(barChartData);
   });
 },

 methods: {
   /**
    * æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ•°æ®
    */
   formatData(data) {
     return data
       .map(({ letter, frequency }) => {
         return { name: letter, value: frequency };
       })
       .sort((a, b) => d3.descending(a.value, b.value));
   },

   /**
    * ç»˜åˆ¶ç›´æ–¹å›¾
    */
   drawBarChart(data) {
     const margin = this.margin;

     const width = 800;
     const height = 500;

     // åˆå§‹åŒ– SVG å…ƒç´ 
     const svg = d3
       .select("#bar-chart-container")
       .append("svg")
       .attr("class", "bar-chart")
       .attr("viewBox", `0 0 ${width} ${height}`)
       .attr("width", width)
       .attr("height", height)
       .append("g");

     // https://observablehq.com/@d3/d3-scaleband
     // x è½´çš„ç¼©æ”¾æ¯”ä¾‹å°º
     const x = d3
       .scaleBand()
       .domain(d3.range(data.length))
       .range([margin.left, width - margin.right])
       .padding(0.1);

     // y è½´çš„ç¼©æ”¾æ¯”ä¾‹å°º
     const y = d3
       .scaleLinear()
       .domain([0, d3.max(data, (d) => d.value)])
       .nice()
       .range([height - margin.bottom, margin.top]);

     // x åæ ‡è½´
     // tickSizeOuter(0) ç§»é™¤ 0 å¤„åˆå§‹çš„æ ‡è®°
     // tickFormat https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#tickFormat
     const xAxis = (g) =>
       g.attr("transform", `translate(0,${height - margin.bottom})`).call(
         d3
           .axisBottom(x)
           .tickFormat((i) => data[i].name)
           .tickSizeOuter(0)
       );

     // y åæ ‡è½´
     const yAxis = (g) =>
       g
         .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},0)`)
         .call(d3.axisLeft(y).ticks(null, data.format))
         // ç§»é™¤åŒºåŸŸé—´çš„ç«–çº¿
         .call((g) => g.select(".domain").remove())
         .call((g) =>
           g
             .append("text")
             .attr("x", -margin.left)
             .attr("y", 10)
             .attr("fill", "currentColor")
             .attr("text-anchor", "start")
             .text(data.y)
         );

     svg
       .append("g")
       .attr("fill", this.color)
       .selectAll("rect")
       .data(data)
       .join("rect")
       .attr("x", (d, i) => x(i))
       .attr("y", (d) => y(d.value))
       .attr("height", (d) => y(0) - y(d.value))
       .attr("width", x.bandwidth());

     // ç»˜åˆ¶åˆ° SVG
     svg.append("g").call(xAxis);
     svg.append("g").call(yAxis);
   },
 },
});
</script>

App.vue

<template>
  <img alt="Vue logo" src="./assets/logo.png" />
  <HelloWorld msg="Hello" />
  <bar-chart />
  <test-axios />

</template>

<script setup>
import HelloWorld from "./components/HelloWorld.vue";
import TestAxios from "./components/TestAxios.vue";
import BarChart from "./components/BarChart.vue";
</script>
  • æœ€ç»ˆå¯è§†åŒ–ç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»
